Text: Keep Your Resolutions with Help from WalgreenscomPST Dear Christopher Its a new year and a time when many people are resolving to finally do all those things that theyve been putting off Making resolutions is one thing but keeping them is another Were here to help Did you resolve to EAT HEALTHY GET FIT STOP SMOKING ORGANIZE YOUR HEALTH CARE Update Your Health History Print Your Prescription Records At Home You can do it Get started here with ideas and tips from Mayo Clinic Health Information And get the products you need from Walgreenscom to help keep your resolution for years to come And remember order just or more from our Store Online and get FREE STANDARD SHIPPING Minimum purchase amount shall not include prescriptions sales tax or shipping charges EATING HEALTHY tips from Mayo Clinic Health Information Trying to lose weight have more energy eat delicious foods and have more variety in your diet this year We can help you eat well every day with these diet and nutrition tips from Mayo Clinic Health Information EATING WELL MEANS ENJOYING VARIETY Trying to eat well but tired of having the same foods over and over Try planning meals around small portions of a variety of foods Following recommended serving sizes makes it easy to enjoy variety while maintaining a healthy weight Read more librarylifestylenutritionfeaturefeatjhtmlectn GOOD AND BAD FATS Trying to lose weight and watching your fat intake In terms of health effects not all fats are alike Sort out the good from the bad with this helpful guide Read more librarylifestylenutritionfeaturefeatjhtmlectn FOODS THAT FIGHT CANCER Did you know that some foods may help reduce your risk of cancer Substances in soy for example may cause changes at the cellular level that hinder cancer cell development and growth Read more librarylifestylenutritiondietdietjhtmlectn NUTRITION CENTER A great resource for good nutrition Featuring uptodate articles recipes expert answers and more Read more ecdhtmectn Remember it is always a good idea to talk with your doctor before beginning any exercise program STOP SMOKING tips from Mayo Clinic Health Information If you smoke chances are youve thought about quitting You may even think about it every New Years Eve This year dont just think quit Get smoke free for and beyond MANY OPTIONS TO HELP YOU QUIT Only about percent of smokers are able to quit without some form of help A variety of prescription and nonprescription options are available to help you quit smoking Read more librarystopsmokingoptionsjhtmlectn WONT I GAIN WEIGHT IF I STOP SMOKING There are several common questions that people who are trying to quit smoking have If youre a smoker the questions probably wont surprise you as youve probably had them yourself The answers however might not only surprise you but may also help you quit librarystopsmokingweightgainjhtmlectn DONT SMOKE JUMP ROPE Many experts in smoking cessation believe exercise significantly aids efforts to stop smoking Learn more about the benefits of exercise and find the right exercise program for the new nonsmoking you Read more librarystopsmokingjumpropejhtmlectn STOP SMOKING CENTRAL With our complete A Heart Healthy FebruaryDear Darrell Its February and hearts are everywhere you look Everyones seen the red paper variety in store windows and in mailboxes but theres another kind of heart that you cant afford to forget Take care of your heart this February and beyond We can help you TAKE THE STRESS OUT OF HEALTH CARE Check Drug Interactions Print Your Prescription Records at Home GET HEART HEALTHY FOR LIFE BEAT HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE Have a healthy heart for years to come with tips articles and products designed to help you help your precious heart And remember order just or more from our Store Online and get FREE STANDARD SHIPPING Minimum purchase amount shall not include prescriptions sales tax or shipping charges ectn TAKE THE STRESS OUT OF HEALTH CARE with Walgreenscom Pharmacy Services CHECK DRUG INTERACTIONS Did you know that Ibuprofen a common drug found in overthecounter medicines like Motrin and Advil causes major drug interactions when combined with the prescription drug Coumadin If youve recently received a sample from your doctor or are trying a new overthecounter medicine be sure and be safe Check for possible interactions between prescriptions vitamins supplements herbals or overthecounter drugs you are taking on Walgreenscom Learn more here helphycdijhtmlectn SAVE TIME THIS TAX SEASON PRINT YOUR PRESCRIPTION RECORDS AT HOME At Walgreenscom you can records right on your own computer Learn more here helphyrxrecordsjhtmlectn For your reference your user name is DS FORGOT YOUR PASSWORD Wed be happy to email your password hint to you Just click here
